libros.tagline: For more than two decades legendary trainer Tim Grover has taken the greats‚ÄîMichael Jordan; Kobe Bryant; Dwyane Wade and hundreds of relentless competitors in sports business and every walk of life‚Äîand made them greater. Relentless shows you how even the best get better and how you can too.

libros.titulo: Brief Answers to the Big Questions
libros.tagline: Stephen Hawking was the most renowned scientist since Einstein.He educated millions of readers about the origins of the universe and the nature of black holes.Hawking not only unraveled some of the universe‚Äôs greatest mysteries but also believed science plays a critical role in fixing problems here on Earth. Now as we face immense challenges on our planet‚Äîincluding climate change the threat of nuclear war and the development of artificial intelligence‚Äîhe turns his attention to the most urgent issues facing us.Will humanity survive? Should we colonize space? Does God exist? ‚Äã‚ÄãThese are just a few of the questions Hawking addresses in this wide-ranging passionately argued final book from one of the greatest minds in history.
